TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but it is also radioactive.

I wish for more support for the Interplanetary Space Science Organization (Forum thing, not real company)

Granted, but the company's headquarters explodes.

I wish that every celestial body had intelligent life that lasted indefinetely..

Granted. They are hostile

I wish for a pet monkey

Granted, but it tears you apart in the blink of an eye.

I wish that every star in the universe except the sun could supernova right now at this exact instant, but leaving Earth intact. Every star EXCEPT THE SUN.

Granted. It leaves earth intact but kills any sign of life and all organisms in the universe. Ever.

I wish for a potato

Granted, but the skin is green, making it poisonous.

I wish for an orange cream soda.

Granted, but its an Orange Scream Soda

i wish for a cherry Pepsi.

Granted. (Removes from fridge on an earthquake machine)

I wish for it to rain even more here!

Granted. It rained so much that the oceans dried out.

I wish for a NORMAL Potato

Granted. Its name is PotatOS and talks to you about a moron.

I wish for a portal gun.

Granted. I stick PotatOS on it and it talks to you like a moron. And you are in Aperature Science

I wish for the universe to implode

Granted, but then we can't play KSP! And you implode as well.

I wish I had $100.

Granted. Enjoy your monopoly paper money.

I wish for daf qptigel

Granted, but you have no idea what it is.

I wish for Moho to be a real planet in real life.

Granted, but you have no idea what it is.

I wish for Moho to be a real planet in real life.

Granted, it's called Mercury.

I wish I could write plugins.

Granted. They suck

I wish for mayonaise. I ran out

Granted, but it tastes like cranberrys.

I wish for a wish that isn't a wish but is a wish.

Granted but a paradox causes time to implode.

I wish for it to rain potato

Granted. It rains on only you causing you to die

I wish for multiple potatos

Granted, but they are poisonous.

I wish for a Saturn analogue in Kerbal Space Program.

Granted. You crash into it and die IRL.

I wish for a muffin that's perfect.

Granted. Right when you go to pick it up you knock over a pot of beets, and the juice soaks into said muffin making it taste awful.

I wish I had a better computer.

Granted. It crashes and its hard drive crashes as soon as you start it.

I wish for multiple solar systems in KSP.

Granted. They will take 2 years irl to get there max time warp

I wish for the sun to get 1 degree cooler

Granted. All life on earth dies.

I wish for my house's AC/Heating to not be essentially busted... >_>
